languages.text: "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан. Надеюсь, спины ваших людей надолго запомнят урок смирения".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. Надеюсь, спины ваших людей надолго запомнят урок смирения".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан. Надеюсь, спины ваших людей надолго запомнят урок смирения".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I hope the backs of your people won't soon forget the upcoming lesson in humility."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Rogue Trader. I hope the backs of your people won't soon forget the upcoming lesson in humility."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “谢谢你，舰长大人。我希望你的船员会牢记即将到来的教训，他们后背上的疼痛会提醒他们的。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，舰长大人。我希望你的船员会牢记即将到来的教训，他们后背上的疼痛会提醒他们的。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Espero que su gente no olvide su inminente lección de humildad. El escozor de sus espaldas ayudará a recordárselo».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Espero que su gente no olvide su inminente lección de humildad. El escozor de sus espaldas ayudará a recordárselo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。{name}様の部下たちが謙虚さの教訓をすぐに忘れないことを願っています…痛みの記憶が、彼らにそれを思い起こさせてくれると良いのですが」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。{name}様の部下たちが謙虚さの教訓をすぐに忘れないことを願っています…痛みの記憶が、彼らにそれを思い起こさせてくれると良いのですが」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Danke, Lord Captain. Ich hoffe, Eure Leute werden die kommende Lektion in Demut nicht so schnell vergessen – ihre schmerzenden Rücken werden die Erinnerung unterstützen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Lord Captain. Ich hoffe, Eure Leute werden die kommende Lektion in Demut nicht so schnell vergessen – ihre schmerzenden Rücken werden die Erinnerung unterstützen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'espère sincèrement qu'une fois la chair du dos à vif, vos gens sauront se souvenir de cette leçon d'humilité. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'espère sincèrement qu'une fois la chair du dos à vif, vos gens sauront se souvenir de cette leçon d'humilité. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Teşekkürler Lord Kaptan. Umarım insanlar alacakları tevazu dersini kolay kolay unutmazlar, sırtlarındaki acılar onlar için birer hatırlatıcı olur."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. I hope your people won't soon forget the coming lesson in humility — their stinging backs will help to remind them."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkürler Lord Kaptan. Umarım insanlar alacakları tevazu dersini kolay kolay unutmazlar, sırtlarındaki acılar onlar için birer hatırlatıcı olur."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
